channel.title: Face glitch - 90% change server side
channel.description:
Hey like u can see in the picture below my guy has a face glitch on some parts of the area u can see his hair color trough his face, if give my guy a beard it just become a holl
does anyone know something against this ? like you see i get this problem even when i am not wearing a helm orsomething so dont give a tutorial that solves the problem of helm wearing pleas if you want to help read before you post a link ...
[img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/8537/serverfaultnj1.png[/img]
thx supra ~ (TimeToDie)

item.title: Face glitch - 90% change server side
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[code]if (isNpc == false) {
if (playerEquipment[playerHat] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerHat]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerCape]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerAmulet] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerAmulet]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerWeapon]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerChest] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerChest]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pTorso);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerShield] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerShield]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (!Item.isPlate(playerEquipment[playerChest])) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pArms);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerLegs] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerLegs]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pLegs);
}
if (!Item.isHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat])) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pHead); // head
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerHands] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerHands]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pHands);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerFeet] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerFeet]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet);
}
if (!Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1))
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard
else
playerProps.writeByte(0);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(-1);
playerProps.writeWord(npcId);

	}[/code]

nothing ronge with it

Read full topic

item.title: Face glitch - 90% change server side
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

No, the problem is the updatemask. The hole is because you aren’t wearing a helmet. Do what kiho says, it will fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Face glitch - 90% change server side
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:7, topic:250885”]Search for

if (isNpc == false) {

if (isNpc == false) { if (playerEquipment[playerHat] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerHat]); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerCape]); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerAmulet] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerAmulet]); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] > 1 && !IsWcing) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerWeapon]); } else if (playerAxe > 0 && IsWcing) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerAxe); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerChest] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerChest]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pTorso); } if (playerEquipment[playerShield] > 1 && !IsWcing) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerShield]); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (!Item4.isPlate(playerEquipment[playerChest])) { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pArms); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerLegs] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerLegs]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pLegs); } if (!Item4.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item4.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat])) { playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pHead); // head } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerHands] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerHands]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pHands); } if (playerEquipment[playerFeet] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerFeet]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet); } if (!Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1)) playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); else playerProps.writeByte(0); } else { playerProps.writeWord(-1); playerProps.writeWord(npcId); }

That’s pretty much all you need to know.

Edit: Player class.[/quote]

jeez if even a moderator cant read :rolleyes:

I AM NOT WEARING ANYTHING ON MY HEAD , the codes you guys provide is when u use a axe, wearing helmet, plate , …

Where did you guys learn to code? mars?

Read full topic

item.title: Face glitch - 90% change server side
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Search for

if (isNpc == false) {

if (isNpc == false) { if (playerEquipment[playerHat] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerHat]); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerCape]); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerAmulet] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerAmulet]); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] > 1 && !IsWcing) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerWeapon]); } else if (playerAxe > 0 && IsWcing) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerAxe); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerChest] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerChest]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pTorso); } if (playerEquipment[playerShield] > 1 && !IsWcing) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerShield]); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (!Item4.isPlate(playerEquipment[playerChest])) { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pArms); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerLegs] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerLegs]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pLegs); } if (!Item4.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item4.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat])) { playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pHead); // head } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerHands] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerHands]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pHands); } if (playerEquipment[playerFeet] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerFeet]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet); } if (!Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1)) playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); else playerProps.writeByte(0); } else { playerProps.writeWord(-1); playerProps.writeWord(npcId); }

That’s pretty much all you need to know.

Edit: Player class.

Read full topic
